lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But the decision affects Eurobonds issued before July 1984 involving principal worth an estimated 30 billion dlrs and will probably mean those bonds will be called before their maturity date, they said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But they could refinance at lower rates because of the general decline in interest rates, so the Department does not expect U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Since most of the bonds are currently trading at a premium, calling them in early will mean a loss in market value for the bondholders, according to a Treasury official who asked not to be identified.
